analyzed: phyag 'tshal tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i dbu skra //

original: mthon mthing lcang lo 'khyil pa'i dbus na //
analyzed: mthon mthing lcang lo 'khyil pa'i dbus na //
translated: In the center of a swirling mass of deep blue hair,

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med las //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med las //
translated: From the perfect Buddha AmitƒÅbha,

original: thugs rje'i 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phro mdzad //üîΩgang gis me tog phreng ba'i bstod pa //
analyzed: thugs rje'i 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phro mdzad // gang gis me tog phreng ba'i bstod pa //
translated: Compassionate light rays radiate in the ten directions.

original: klog gam kha dog 'don par byed pa //
analyzed: klog gam kha dog 'don par byed pa //
translated: Whoever reads or recites this garland of praises

original: de yis bsod nams dpag med 'thob cing //üîΩsdig sgrib stobs chen ma lus dag 'gyur //
analyzed: de yis bsod nams dpag med 'thob cing // sdig sgrib stobs chen ma lus dag 'gyur //
translated: Will attain immeasurable merit

original: gang zhig skye bo tha mal rnams kyis //
analyzed: gang zhig skye bo tha mal rnams kyis //
translated: And purify all powerful negative karma and obscurations without exception.üîΩWhoever recites this

original: 'di 'don pa de dge spyong du 'gyur //üîΩ@284a * // gnag g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi //
analyzed: 'di 'don pa de dge spyong du 'gyur // @284a * // gnag g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi //
translated: Will become a virtuous monk.üîΩThe buddhas as numerous as the grains of sand in the Ganges

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis rlobs 'gyur //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis rlobs 'gyur //
translated: Will bless him.

original: su yis blo la bstod pa 'di 'dzin //üîΩ'dul khrims sdom pa dam tshig rnams kyi //üîΩnyes byas sbom pa rtsa ltung dri ma //
analyzed: su yis blo la bstod pa 'di 'dzin // 'dul khrims sdom pa dam tshig rnams kyi // nyes byas sbom pa rtsa ltung dri ma //
translated: Whoever holds this praise in their mindüîΩWill attain siddhiüîΩBy purifying all transgressions, serious faults, and stains

original: ma lus dag nas dngos grub thob 'gyur //
analyzed: ma lus dag nas dngos grub thob 'gyur //
translated: Of the vows, precepts, and samayas.

original: 'di 'don blo yi padma kha 'byed //
analyzed: 'di 'don blo yi padma kha 'byed //
translated: Reciting this will open the lotus of the mind

original: rgol ba ngan pa'i lung rigs tshar gcod //
analyzed: rgol ba ngan pa'i lung rigs tshar gcod //
translated: And defeat the bad logic of opponents.

original: rig pa'i gnas la shes rab chen po //
analyzed: rig pa'i gnas la shes rab chen po //
translated: And in the sciences, great wisdom,

original: zla ba yar ngo bzhin du 'phel 'gyur //
analyzed: zla ba yar ngo bzhin du 'phel 'gyur //
translated: Increasing like the waxing moon.

original: ae ma bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di ni /
analyzed: ae ma bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di ni /
translated: Ah! This king of praises,

original: lan cig yid la dran pa tsam gyis //üîΩzhing mchog dag pa bde ba can der //
analyzed: lan cig yid la dran pa tsam gyis // zhing mchog dag pa bde ba can der //
translated: Merely by recalling it once in the mind,

original: the tshom med par nges par skye 'gyur //
analyzed: the tshom med par nges par skye 'gyur //
translated: Without doubt, one will definitely be bornüîΩIn that pure, supreme field of SukhƒÅvatƒ´.üîΩBy this virtue, which is like a boat,

original: 'gro pa'i skyabs mchog rje btsun ma la //
analyzed: 'gro pa'i skyabs mchog rje btsun ma la //
translated: Of praising the noble one, supreme refuge of beings,

original: bdag gis me tog phreng bas bstod pa'i //üîΩdge ba gru gzings lta bu des ni //
analyzed: bdag gis me tog phreng bas bstod pa'i // dge ba gru gzings lta bu des ni //
translated: With a garland of flowers,

original: srid gsum 'khor ba'i mtsho las sgrol 'gyur //
analyzed: srid gsum 'khor ba'i mtsho las sgrol 'gyur //
translated: May I liberate from the ocean of the three existences.üîΩThis garland of praises

original: me tog phreng ba'i bstod pa 'di ni //
analyzed: me tog phreng ba'i bstod pa 'di ni //
translated: Was composed by the master called Candragomin,üîΩEndowed with many qualities of great knowledge

original: rje btsun ma la lnga brgya pa rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i khur che ba'i yon tan du ma dang ldan pa //
analyzed: rje btsun ma la lnga brgya pa rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i khur che ba'i yon tan du ma dang ldan pa //
translated: Of the five hundred praises to the noble one.
